welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Barton upon Irwell, where quaint charm meets historic beauty. Get ready to explore our city, known for its picturesque landscapes, rich history, and warm community. We hope you enjoy your stay here!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a wide range of international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a variety of shops, restaurants, and lounges for passengers to enjoy while waiting for their flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used by low-cost carriers, offering a more streamlined and efficient travel experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with premium options for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport primarily serves low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport handles a variety of goods and products, connecting businesses to global markets.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport terminal.
